CustomField.description: Campo para fazer o de/para entre o Asset e o objeto de ofertas
CustomField.formula:
IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE B'), 'Basico HD', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE FULL HD FUTEBOL'), 'Full HD Futebol', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE FULL HD'), 'Full HD', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE STANDARD'), 'Standard HD', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE SUPER HD FUTEBOL'), 'Super HD Futebol', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE SUPER HD'), 'Super HD', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE ULTIMATE HD FUTEBO'), 'Ultimate HD Futebol', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE ULTIMATE HD'), 'Ultimate HD', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE ULTRA HD FUTEBOL'), 'Ultra HD Futebol', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'PACOTE ULTRA'), 'Ultra HD', IF(OR(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY PADRAO'),BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY PADRÃO')), 'Vivo Play Padrão', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY ESSENCIAL'), 'Vivo Play Essencial', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY ULTRA'), 'Vivo Play Ultra', IF(OR(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY AVANCADO'),BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY AVANÇADO')), 'Vivo Play Avançado', IF(BEGINS(MainProductDescription__c,'VIVO PLAY COMPLETO'), 'Vivo Play Completo',
'SEM OFERTA TV')))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Oferta TV
